oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Memphis Silver Star News: "Central Library Renamed for Hooks"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Memphis Public Library & Information Center; Central Library;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An article from the Memphis Silver Star News about the Central Library being renamed in honor of Hooks.
